title: Breakingviews TV: Oscars flop
text:
Breakingviews TV: Oscars flop 12:46pm EST - 02:52 
Jennifer Saba and Richard Beales discuss the 20 percent slide in viewers for Sunday’s Academy Awards, as well as live-TV audience declines for the NFL and the Winter Olympics. Are broadcasters losing one of their last defenses against on-demand rivals like Netflix?
